dict.acceptation: 双的；两倍的；两面派的；双人用的；

sent.orig: However, the conversion to double is an exact match; it requires no additional standard conversion.
sent.trans: 但是，到double的转换是一个完全匹配，不需要额外的标准转换。

sent.orig: Golan Levin, an artist, designed a large, elephant like snout, dubbed Double-Taker at passing pedestrians.
sent.trans: 而艺术家戈兰·莱文(GolanLevin)则设计出一个巨大的、类似象鼻子的玩意儿，并命名为“Double-Taker”，它的“眼睛”会追随过往行人的身影并扭动“身躯”。

sent.orig: Other useful constructors, methods, and constants are predefined in the classes Float, Double, and Math.
sent.trans: 其他有用的构造函数，方法和常数在类Float和Double以及Math中定义。

sent.orig: To test your double-tap settings, double-tap the image. The image changes when your double-tap is successful.
sent.trans: 要测试双点击设置，双点击此图像。点击成功时图像就会改变。

sent.orig: It includes: the potentiometric double-point titration, polarographic double-point titration and coulometric double-point titration.
sent.trans: 内容包括：电位双点滴定法、极谱双点滴定法和库仑双点滴定法。
